articles.title: Hindustan Zinc surges 6% as board to consider second dividend on December 6 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The record date to determine the eligibility for dividend payout is December 14, Hindustan Zinc has said
articles.content:
Hindustan Zinc surged more than 6 percent to Rs 319 on December 4 after the company said that its board on December 6 would consider paying out a second interim dividend for current financial year.
